Our staff and students are completely grateful for this donation!

The Cleveland Cavaliers surprised Antonio M. at Constellation Schools: Puritas Community Elementary as their February All-Star Kid. He was nominated by his teacher Ms. Jones who had so many wonderful things to say about him!.

"Antonio loves to learn. His enthusiasm for learning is infectious and inspires his fellow students. He is often the first to grasp new concepts. However, instead of moving on or getting ahead with new things, he will seek out others in need of help with the skills he has already mastered. He often does this without prompting. Antonio also won our school-wide 3rd grade Spelling Bee last year and again this year in 4th grade. He earns Honor Roll every quarter (All As and Bs) and is quick to congratulate others on their successes academically as well. Antonio is one of those rare students who not only completes his work in a timely manner, but takes pride in how he presents it."

Congrats to Antonio!

The OBCS - PTT Enrichment Committee worked tirelessly to bring the vibrant, positive energy our students feel everyday inside of Constellation Schools: Old Brooklyn Community Elementary the outside! Thank you to Cherie Kaiser, our amazing Principal, for supporting and encouraging this project!
